topComments.author: Tanya Justice
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Estou postando isso como uma m√£e de adolescentes que gostam de andar sozinhos.  Eu aprecio as muitas √°reas diferentes que o parque tem. Gosto de passear e ver todas as diferentes plantas, obras de arte, exposi√ß√µes e paisagismo. Quem cuida das plantas faz um trabalho maravilhoso! E a variedade das v√°rias exposi√ß√µes/obras de arte √© linda.  H√° muitos lugares sentados ao redor do parque, muitos com sombra. At√© mesmo algumas cadeiras de balan√ßo espalhadas por toda parte.  Todas as lojas de presentes t√™m uma variedade de itens, n√£o s√£o todos a mesma coisa. Faz uma experi√™ncia agrad√°vel andando e vendo uma nova loja para navegar.  Desejo que em seu aplicativo, eles esclare√ßam quais restaurantes / passeios est√£o fechados. Dois restaurantes que tentei ir estavam fechados, embora o aplicativo e o Google Maps os mostrassem como abertos. E alguns passeios que estou animado para experimentar foram fechados toda vez que visitei.  Ao todo, uma experi√™ncia agrad√°vel, mesmo se voc√™ estiver apenas no parque para seus filhos andarem nos brinquedos.  (Original) I am posting this as a mom of teenagers that like walk around by themselves.  I appreciate the many different areas the park has. I enjoy walking around and seeing all the different plants, artwork, exhibits and landscaping. Whoever takes care of the plants does a wonderful job! And the variety of the various exhibits/artwork is beautiful.  There is lots of seating around the park, plenty with shade. Even some rocking chairs scattered around throughout.  All of the gift shops have a variety of items, they aren't all the same thing. Makes for an enjoyable experience walking around and seeing a new store to browse through.  I do wish that in their app, they would clarify what restaurants/rides are closed. Two restaurants that I tried to go to were closed, although the app and Google Maps showed them as open. And a few rides that I'm excited to try have been closed each time I've visited.  All in all, a nice experience, even if you are just at the park for your kids to ride the rides.

topComments.author: Sarah Flatt
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Passeios incr√≠veis e um √≥timo lugar para divers√£o em fam√≠lia! Tudo √© caro e os funcion√°rios parecem sobrecarregados. Planeje pagar US$ 22 por um arm√°rio pequeno (1 mochila). O parque √© sem dinheiro, ent√£o traga cart√µes de cr√©dito ou visite um dos quiosques (no parque) onde voc√™ pode colocar dinheiro e usar como cart√£o de cr√©dito. Al√©m disso, se o seu filho for alto o suficiente, pare na frente do parque (√† esquerda) e me√ßa-o para uma pulseira! Faz as coisas correrem bem quando eles questionam sua altura!  (Original) Awesome rides and a great place for family fun! Everything is overpriced and staff seem overwhelmed. Plan to pay $22 for a small locker (1 backpack). The park is cashless, so bring credit cards or visit one of the kiosks (in the park) that you can put cash into and use like a credit card. Also, if your child is just tall enough stop at the front of the park (on the left) and have them measured for a wristband! It makes things go smoothly when they question their height!

topComments.author: wafer smash
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Melhor parque de divers√µes de longe na √°rea. 2 montanhas-russas muito boas (Fury and the Intimidator) e toneladas para fazer com a fam√≠lia. Se voc√™ √© pelo menos um pouco local, o passe de temporada √© um √≥timo neg√≥cio e ganhei um desconto por ser um veterano. O passe de refei√ß√£o durante todo o dia tamb√©m √© muito legal! Eles t√™m alguns √≥timos lugares para comer (al√©m de algumas coisas gen√©ricas, √© claro). Meus filhos adoram o parque aqu√°tico.  (Original) Best amusement park by a long shot in the area.  2 really good coasters (Fury and the Intimidator) and tons to do with the family.  If you're at least somewhat local, the season pass is a great deal and I got a discount for being a veteran.  All day meal pass is pretty cool too!  They have a couple great places to eat (plus some generic stuff of course).  My kids LOVE the water park.

topComments.author: lil ap
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Abriga a montanha-russa de madeira mais antiga dos EUA. Muita divers√£o. Fomos com toda a nossa fam√≠lia. As filas andam bem r√°pido. Eles t√™m muitos procedimentos de seguran√ßa para manter todos seguros. Comida era muito boa tamb√©m. Eu recomendo o passe de ouro (passe sazonal) com plano de refei√ß√µes. Valeu muito a pena. Fomos durante o carnaval. Os carros aleg√≥ricos e a m√∫sica foram √≥timos! Foi uma grande festa de dan√ßa no final da noite. O evento terminou com fogos de artif√≠cio. Mal posso esperar para voltar!  (Original) It houses the oldest wooden rollercoaster in the USA. Lots of fun. We went with our entire family. Lines move pretty fast. They have lots of safety procedures in place to keep everyone safe. Food was pretty good too. I recommend the gold pass ( seasonal pass) with meal plan. It was well worth it. We went during carnival. The floats and music were great! It was a huge dance party by the end of the night. The even ended with fireworks. I can not wait to go back!

topComments.author: Anthony Johnson
topComments.comment: Today and was lots of fun.  North & South Carolina joined together and made carowinds üòÇüòÇ. The water park was great and a very large area of slides & wave pools.  We did the water park in the day time and came back later to do the roller coasters.  Fun atmosphere and staff was nice and asked us did we need anything.  Plenty of security around also.
